extendedInfo.description: eclaireMD Healthy Eating is a simple and effective guide to healthy eating. Just build your meal by choosing from among hundreds of basic food items or select restaurant menu items from any of the top 400 chain restaurants. eclaireMD Healthy Eating shows the effect of the your selected meal on your weight, peak after-meal blood glucose, and the condition of your heart. With eclaireMD Healthy Eating: You don't need to count calories--just measure your food portions visually You don't need expensive and cumbersome measuring tools. You don't need to understand those confusing and overly scientific nutrition labels eclaireMD Healthy Eating is immediate, accurate, easy and fun to use, and effective in helping you know how healthy your meals are.
